emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait, left to right front row, Joycelyn Johnson, Mary Lou Brown, winner of the luggage set, and Dessie Tolbert holding piece of luggage. Back row, Roberta Tyler, Barbara Yancey, Justine Givener, and Geraldine Galloway, standing in Loendi Club, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 16, 1961, pg. A15 reads: "Won Luggage - Alpha Sigma Gamma Sorority sponsored a popularity contest and dance, recently, at Loendi Club. The prize, a three-piece set of luggage was won by Mary Lou Brown, who won out over Jocelyn Johnson by the small margin of a dime.  The girls are students at Westinghouse High School.  The presentation of the luggage was made to the winner by the sorority's sponsor, Mrs. Dessie Tolbert.  Left to right, are: Joycelyn Johnson, Mary Lou Brown and Mrs. Tolbert.  Standing, in same order, are; Roberta Tyler, Barbara Yancey, Justine Givener and Geraldine Galloway. - Harris photo."
